body.p: From time to time, upgrades and patch versions of are released to provide enhancements that fix problems and add new features.

By default, automatically checks for new versions at startup (or every 24 hours from startup). If a newer version is detected, a dialog box will automatically be displayed that provides information about the type of upgrade or update that is available. If a new patch of a new version is detected, the dialog box will be displayed only when the new patch version includes a critical bug fix or when the license allows upgrading to the new version.
To disable this check, , go to Global, and deselect Automatic Version Checking.
To check for new versions manually, go to Help Check for New Versions . This opens a dialog box that displays information about whether or not a newer version is available.
